title: Looking for team/friends to play league with
body:
i am bronze 2 looking to climb hard or join a team 

PM me IG to play with me

IG: Brother Zapha

replies.body: I'm keen. Just won 50% of my promos only to get Bronze 5 and looking to play with people that at least know a few key game winning strategies that don't involve rolling your face over a keyboard and hoping that works
